namespace = POP_Census
country_event = {
	id = POP_Census.001
	title = "POP_Census.001.t"
	desc = "POP_Census.001.d"
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_AU_eventPicture
	hidden = yes
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = {
		set_global_flag = POP_Census_calc
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				has_country_flag = center_of_universe
			}
			clr_country_flag = center_of_universe
		}
		set_country_flag = center_of_universe
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					all_owned_province = {
						has_province_flag = no_horses_present
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							has_country_flag = no_cavalry
						}
					}
					set_country_flag = no_cavalry
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_flag = no_cavalry
				}
				clr_country_flag = no_cavalry
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			export_to_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_stability
				value = stability
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_stability
				value = 0.1
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_stability
				value = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							which = national_multiplier_stability
							value = 1.3
						}
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = national_multiplier_stability
						value = 1.2
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = stability_threshold
					value = 300
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = national_multiplier_stability
						value = 1.1
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = stability_threshold
					value = 200
				}
			}
			else_if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = national_multiplier_stability
						value = 1.0
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = stability_threshold
					value = 150
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_variable = {
					which = stability_threshold
					value = 100
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = stability_points_to_go
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = stability_points_to_go
				which = stability_threshold
			}
			subtract_variable = {
				which = stability_points_to_go
				which = stability_points
			}
			export_to_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_prestige
				value = prestige
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					check_variable = {
						which = national_multiplier_prestige
						value = 0.01
					}
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = national_multiplier_prestige
					value = 800
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = national_multiplier_prestige
					value = 1
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_variable = {
					which = national_multiplier_prestige
					value = 1
				}
			}
			export_to_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_war_exhaustion
				value = war_exhaustion
			}
			divide_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_war_exhaustion
				value = -60
			}
			change_variable = {
				which = national_multiplier_war_exhaustion
				value = 1
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = country_total_pop_r
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = country_total_urban
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = country_percent_urbanized
				value = 0
			}
			every_owned_province = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_pop_r
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_percent_urbanized
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_pop_r
					which = total_pop_r
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_urban
					which = total_pop_r
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = country_total_urban
					which = urban_ratio
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = country_total_urban
					value = 0.01
				}
				PREV = {
					change_variable = {
						which = country_total_pop_r
						which = PREV
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = country_total_urban
						which = PREV
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_pop_r
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_urban
					value = 0
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							which = country_total_pop_r
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_pop_r
					value = 0.001
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							which = country_percent_urbanized
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_percent_urbanized
					which = country_total_urban
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = country_percent_urbanized
					which = country_total_pop_r
				}
			}
			else = {
				set_variable = {
					which = country_percent_urbanized
					value = 0
				}
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = country_percent_urbanized
				value = 100
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = country_total_pop
				which = country_total_pop_r
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = country_total_pop
				value = 0.1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							which = country_total_pop
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_pop
					value = 0.001
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						check_variable = {
							which = country_total_pop_r
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = country_total_pop_r
					value = 0.001
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = capital_relevance
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = capital_relevance
				which = country_total_pop
			}
			multiply_variable = {
				which = capital_relevance
				value = 0.7
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = absolutismvar
				value = 0
			}
			trigger_switch = {

	option = {
		name = "POP_Census.001.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = dev_events_instant
			}

				id = POP_Census.002
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				NOT = {
					has_global_flag = dev_events_instant
				}
			}
			country_event = {
				id = POP_Census.002
				days = 5
			}
		}
	}

			region = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
					has_province_flag = mined_goods
				}

					which = price_of_metal
					value = 1
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_flag
					tin = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 3
						}
					}
					coal = {

										area = bornu_area
										area = kanem_area
										region = mali_region
										region = volta_region
										region = kong_region
										region = oyo_region
										region = manding_region
										region = niger_region
										region = hausa_region
										region = gulf_of_nigeria_region
										province_id = 2920
										province_id = 2929
										province_id = 1559
									}
								}
								NOT = {
									any_province = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												region = west_africa_region
												area = bornu_area
												area = kanem_area
												region = mali_region
												region = volta_region
												region = kong_region
												region = oyo_region
												region = manding_region
												region = niger_region
												region = hausa_region
												region = gulf_of_nigeria_region
												province_id = 2920
												province_id = 2929
												province_id = 1559
											}
										}
										NOT = {
											province_id = 1096
										}
										owner = {
											capital_scope = {
												continent = europe
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = price_of_metal
								value = 4
							}
						}
					}
					salt = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 4
						}
					}
					copper = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 4
						}
					}
					sulphur = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 3
						}
					}
					marble = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 3
						}
					}
					gems = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 10
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									continent = north_america
									continent = south_america
								}
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = new_world_plague
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = price_of_metal
								value = 3
							}
						}
					}
					silver = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 9
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									continent = north_america
									continent = south_america
								}
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = new_world_plague
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = price_of_metal
								value = 2.5
							}
						}
					}
					gold = {
						set_variable = {
							which = price_of_metal
							value = 10
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								OR = {
									continent = north_america
									continent = south_america
								}
								NOT = {
									has_global_flag = new_world_plague
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = price_of_metal
								value = 2.5
							}
						}
						else_if = {
							limit = {
								AND = {
									OR = {
										region = west_africa_region
										area = bornu_area
										area = kanem_area

									any_province = {
										AND = {
											OR = {
												region = west_africa_region
												area = bornu_area
												area = kanem_area
												region = mali_region
												region = volta_region

												region = hausa_region
												region = gulf_of_nigeria_region
												province_id = 2920

											}

							}

						}

						}
					}

				set_variable = {
					which = mine_productivity_modifier
					value = 0.1
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_building
					mines_1 = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mine_productivity_modifier
							value = 0.5
						}
					}
					mines_2 = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mine_productivity_modifier
							value = 1.1
						}
					}
					mines_3 = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mine_productivity_modifier
							value = 1.7
						}
					}
					mines_4 = {

							value = 2.3
						}
					}
					mines_5 = {
						change_variable = {
							which = mine_productivity_modifier
							value = 2.9
						}
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mine_power
					value = 1.50
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mine_power
					which = mine_productivity_modifier
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mine_productivity_modifier
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mine_abundance_modifier
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mine_abundance_modifier
					which = mine_deposit_current
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mine_abundance_modifier
					value = 0.002
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mine_abundance_modifier
					which = mine_power
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = mine_power
					which = mine_abundance_modifier
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = mine_deposit_current
					which = mine_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mine_abundance_modifier
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = mine_power_display
					which = mine_power
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							check_variable = {
								which = mine_power_display
								value = 0.01
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mine_power_display
						value = 0.01
					}
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mine_power_display
					value = 0.1
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = mine_power_display
					value = 10
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							check_variable = {

								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = mine_deposit_current
						value = 0
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_flag
					obsidian = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {

country_event = {
	id = POP_Census.004
	title = "POP_Census.004.t"
	desc = "POP_Census.004.d"
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_AU_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_power_percentage
				value = 1
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					full_idea_group = engineering_ideas
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power_percentage
					value = 0.15
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_idea = production_rights
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power_percentage
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_country_modifier = republic_production_improvements
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power_percentage
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					has_institution = manufactories
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power_percentage
					value = 0.10
				}
			}
			trigger_switch = {
				on_trigger = has_country_flag
				BG_appoint_as_court_suppliers_1 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = urban_production_power_percentage
						value = 0.1
					}
				}
				BG_appoint_as_court_suppliers_2 = {
					change_variable = {
						which = urban_production_power_percentage
						value = 0.2
					}
				}
			}
			export_to_variable = {
				which = temp
				value = modifier:development_cost
			}
		}
		regiongroup = {
			region = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power_percentage
					which = owner
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power_percentage
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_power_percentage
						value = 1
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power
					which = urban_pop
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = urban_production_power
					value = 0.05
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_building
					workshop = {
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_power
							which = urban_pop
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = urban_pop
									value = 4
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power
								value = 0.05
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power
								value = 3.4
							}
						}
						else = {
							multiply_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power
								value = 0.9
							}
						}
					}
					corporation_guild = {
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_power
							which = urban_pop
						}

							limit = {

									which = urban_pop

								}

								which = urban_production_power
								value = 0.1
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power

							}
						}
						else = {
							multiply_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power

							}
						}
					}
					urban_manufactory = {
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_power

						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = urban_pop
									value = 16
								}

								which = urban_production_power
								value = 0.2
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power
								value = 12.8
							}
						}
						else = {
							multiply_variable = {
								which = urban_production_power
								value = 1
							}
						}
					}
					factory = {
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_power

						}

						}

						else = {

							}

							value = 0.10
						}
					}

					}

						}

					which = urban_production_power

					value = 0
				}

					which = temp
					value = modifier:local_development_cost
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = temp
					which = owner
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = temp
								which = dev_cost_mod_save
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = no_recalc_infra
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_gravity_base
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_gravity_percentage
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_gravity_base
							which = rural_pop
						}

							which = urban_gravity_base
							value = 0.01
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = wealth_urban_as_asset
							value = 0
						}

								}

							minor_center_of_transport = {

									value = 0.25
								}

								}

							}

									value = 0.5
								}

							}

								}
							}

								change_variable = {
									which = urban_gravity_base
									value = 1
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = urban_gravity_percentage
									value = 0.25
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = wealth_urban_growth_multiplier
									value = 0.20
								}

						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_building
							bureaucracy_1 = {
								change_variable = {
									which = urban_gravity_base
									value = 0.5
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = urban_gravity_percentage
									value = 0.25

										is_capital = no

										value = 1

										value = 30

										value = 1

						export_to_variable = {
							which = development_build_cost_mod
							value = modifier:local_development_cost
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = development_build_cost_mod
							which = temp
						}

							limit = {
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = development_build_cost_mod
										value = 0
									}
								}
							}
							subtract_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_mod
								value = 1
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_var
								value = 1
							}
							divide_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_var
								which = development_build_cost_mod
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_var
								value = 1
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_mod
								value = 1
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_mod
								value = 100
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_var
								which = urban_development_cost
							}
							subtract_variable = {
								which = urban_development_cost
								which = development_build_cost_var
							}
						}
						else = {
							set_variable = {
								which = development_build_cost_var
								value = 0
							}
						}

							which = development_build_cost_var

													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_6
												}
												urban_development_rank_7 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_7
												}
												urban_development_rank_8 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_8
												}
												urban_development_rank_9 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_9
												}
												urban_development_rank_10 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_10
												}
											}
											add_permanent_province_modifier = {
												name = urban_development_rank_3
												duration = -1
											}
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													has_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_2
												}
											}
											trigger_switch = {
												on_trigger = has_province_modifier
												urban_development_rank_0 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_0
												}
												urban_development_rank_1 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_1
												}
												urban_development_rank_2 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_2
												}
												urban_development_rank_3 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_3
												}
												urban_development_rank_4 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_4
												}
												urban_development_rank_5 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_5
												}
												urban_development_rank_6 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_6
												}
												urban_development_rank_7 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_7
												}
												urban_development_rank_8 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_8
												}
												urban_development_rank_9 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_9
												}
												urban_development_rank_10 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_10
												}
											}
											add_permanent_province_modifier = {
												name = urban_development_rank_2
												duration = -1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								else = {
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = wealth_urban_as_asset
												value = 300
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													has_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_1
												}
											}
											trigger_switch = {
												on_trigger = has_province_modifier
												urban_development_rank_0 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_0
												}
												urban_development_rank_1 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_1
												}
												urban_development_rank_2 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_2
												}
												urban_development_rank_3 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_3
												}
												urban_development_rank_4 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_4
												}
												urban_development_rank_5 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_5
												}
												urban_development_rank_6 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_6
												}
												urban_development_rank_7 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_7
												}
												urban_development_rank_8 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_8
												}
												urban_development_rank_9 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_9
												}
												urban_development_rank_10 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_10
												}
											}
											add_permanent_province_modifier = {
												name = urban_development_rank_1
												duration = -1
											}
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													has_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_0
												}
											}
											trigger_switch = {
												on_trigger = has_province_modifier
												urban_development_rank_0 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_0
												}
												urban_development_rank_1 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_1
												}
												urban_development_rank_2 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_2
												}
												urban_development_rank_3 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_3
												}
												urban_development_rank_4 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_4
												}
												urban_development_rank_5 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_5
												}
												urban_development_rank_6 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_6
												}
												urban_development_rank_7 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_7
												}
												urban_development_rank_8 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_8
												}
												urban_development_rank_9 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_9
												}
												urban_development_rank_10 = {
													remove_province_modifier = urban_development_rank_10
												}
											}
											add_permanent_province_modifier = {
												name = urban_development_rank_0
												duration = -1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = infra_calc_done
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = dev_cost_mod_save
					which = temp
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_power_percentage
				value = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = "POP_Census.004.a"
		ai_chance = {
			factor = 100
		}
	}
}
country_event = {
	id = POP_Census.0042
	title = no_localisation
	desc = no_localisation
	picture = COMET_SIGHTED_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		regiongroup = {
			region = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill
						value = 0
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill
							value = 5
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = urban_production_power
									value = 2
								}
							}
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill
							value = 0.15
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 35
							}
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = production_center_modifier_has
								has_province_modifier = subsidize_urban_industry

											set_variable = {
												which = urban_good_naval_supplies_quantity
												value = 0
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												NOT = {
													has_province_modifier = naval_supplies_1
												}
											}
											add_permanent_province_modifier = {
												name = naval_supplies_1
												duration = -1
											}
										}
									}
									urban_goods_paper = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_3
											}
											set_variable = {
												which = urban_good_paper_quantity
												value = 0
											}
											set_variable = {
												which = urban_good_paper_quantity
												which = urban_production_power
											}
										}
										else = {
											set_variable = {
												which = urban_good_paper_quantity
												value = 0

												name = paper_1

											}

										if = {
											limit = {

										if = {
											limit = {
												has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_3
											}
											set_variable = {
												which = urban_good_luxury_cloth_quantity
												value = 0
											}
											set_variable = {
												which = urban_good_luxury_cloth_quantity

										}
										else = {
											set_variable = {

												value = 0

												name = luxury_cloth_1
												duration = -1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_1
								has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_2
								has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_3
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = urban_goods_mundane
						set_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_1
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_added
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_multiplier
						value = 1
					}
					trigger_switch = {
						on_trigger = has_province_modifier
						minor_center_of_production = {
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill_added
								value = 0.5
							}
						}
						important_center_of_production = {
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill_added
								value = 1
							}
						}
						major_center_of_production = {
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill_added
								value = 1.5
							}
						}
						dominant_center_of_production = {
							set_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill_added
								value = 2
							}
						}
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							has_province_modifier = promote_urban_industry
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_added
							value = 2
						}
					}
					owner = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_idea = production_rights
							}
							PREV = {
								change_variable = {
									which = urban_production_skill_multiplier
									value = 0.1
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								full_idea_group = engineering_ideas
							}
							PREV = {
								change_variable = {
									which = urban_production_skill_multiplier
									value = 0.15
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								full_idea_group = innovativeness_ideas
							}
							PREV = {
								change_variable = {
									which = urban_production_skill_multiplier
									value = 0.25
								}
							}
						}
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_added
						which = urban_production_skill_multiplier
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 150
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_excess
							which = urban_production_skill
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_excess
							value = 150
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_added
							which = urban_production_skill_excess
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill
							value = 150
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_excess
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_multiplier
						value = 0
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill_added
								value = 0.01
							}
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 75
							}
						}
						set_province_flag = production_spread
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_spread
							which = urban_production_skill_added
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_spread
							which = urban_production_skill
						}
						divide_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_spread
							value = 150
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_added
							which = urban_production_skill_spread
						}
					}
					else = {
						clr_province_flag = production_spread
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_weight
					which = urban_production_power
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = multiplier
					value = 100
				}
				subtract_variable = {
					which = multiplier
					which = urban_production_skill
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							check_variable = {
								which = multiplier
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = multiplier
						value = 0
					}
				}
				else = {
					multiply_variable = {
						which = multiplier
						value = 0.01
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = inp_m_exp
						which = multiplier
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = inp_m_exp
									value = 0
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = exp_val
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = err.math.exp.undef
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else_if = {
						limit = {
							is_variable_equal = {
								which = inp_m_exp
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = exp_val
							value = 0
						}
					}
					else = {
						set_variable = {
							which = exp_m_exp
							value = 1.5
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = int_m_exp
							which = exp_m_exp
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = int_m_exp
							value = 0.001
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = int_m_exp
							value = 1000
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = dec_m_exp
							which = exp_m_exp
						}
						subtract_variable = {
							which = dec_m_exp
							which = int_m_exp
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = inp
							which = inp_m_exp
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = inp
										value = 0.001
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = ln_val
								value = 0
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = err.math.ln.undef
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = {
							set_variable = {
								which = ln_val
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = scale
								value = 10000
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = k
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = k_div
								which = scale
							}
							while = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = inp
										value = 2.001
									}
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = inp
									value = 0.5
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = ln_val
									value = 6931.472
								}
							}
							while = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = inp
											value = 1
										}
									}
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = inp
									value = 2
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = ln_val
									value = 6931.472
								}
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = inp
								which = scale
							}
							while = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = k
											value = 10
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = k
									value = 1
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = k_div
									value = 0.5
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t_m_ln
									which = scale
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = t_m_ln
									which = k_div
								}
								if = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = inp
											which = t_m_ln
										}
									}
									divide_variable = {
										which = inp
										which = t_m_ln
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = inp
										which = scale
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = lt_ind
										which = k
									}
									if = {
										limit = {
											check_variable = {
												which = lt_ind
												value = 6
											}
										}
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = lt_ind
													value = 8
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													check_variable = {
														which = lt_ind
														value = 9
													}
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														check_variable = {
															which = lt_ind
															value = 10
														}
													}
													set_variable = {
														which = lt_val
														value = 9.761
													}
												}
												else = {
													set_variable = {
														which = lt_val
														value = 19.512
													}
												}
											}
											else = {
												set_variable = {
													which = lt_val
													value = 38.986
												}
											}
										}
										else = {
											if = {
												limit = {
													check_variable = {
														which = lt_ind
														value = 7
													}

													which = lt_val
													value = 77.821
												}
											}
											else = {
												set_variable = {
													which = lt_val
													value = 155.042
												}
											}
										}
									}
									else = {
										if = {
											limit = {
												check_variable = {
													which = lt_ind
													value = 3
												}
											}
											if = {
												limit = {
													check_variable = {
														which = lt_ind
														value = 4
													}
												}
												if = {
													limit = {
														check_variable = {
															which = lt_ind
															value = 5
														}
													}
													set_variable = {
														which = lt_val
														value = 307.717
													}
												}
												else = {
													set_variable = {
														which = lt_val
														value = 606.246
													}
												}
											}
											else = {
												set_variable = {
													which = lt_val
													value = 1177.83
												}
											}
										}
										else = {
											if = {
												limit = {
													check_variable = {
														which = lt_ind
														value = 2
													}
												}
												set_variable = {
													which = lt_val
													value = 2231.436
												}
											}
											else = {
												set_variable = {
													which = lt_val
													value = 4054.651
												}
											}
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = lt_ind
										value = 0
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = ln_val
										which = lt_val
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = t_m_ln
									value = 0
								}
							}
							divide_variable = {
								which = ln_val
								value = 10000
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = scale
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = k
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = k_div
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = lt_val
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = inp
							value = 0
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = dec_m_exp
							which = ln_val
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = math.e.expnt
							which = dec_m_exp
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = math.e.return
							value = 1
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								NOT = {
									check_variable = {
										which = math.e.expnt
										value = -6.999
									}
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = exp_val
								value = 0
							}
						}
						else = {
							while = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = math.e.expnt
										value = 1
									}
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = math.e.expnt
									value = 1
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = math.e.return
									value = 2.718
								}
							}
							while = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										check_variable = {
											which = math.e.expnt
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = math.e.expnt
									value = 1
								}
								divide_variable = {
									which = math.e.return
									value = 2.718
								}
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.sm
								value = 1
							}
							if = {
								limit = {
									NOT = {
										is_variable_equal = {
											which = math.e.expnt
											value = 0
										}
									}
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = math.e.sq
									which = math.e.expnt
								}
								multiply_variable = {
									which = math.e.sq
									which = math.e.expnt
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = math.e.fct
									value = 2
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = math.e.fctl
									value = 2
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = math.e.a1
									which = math.e.sq
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = math.e.a2
									which = math.e.expnt
								}

									which = math.e.a3
									value = 2
								}

									which = math.e.a2
								}

									which = math.e.a3

									which = math.e.tmp
									which = math.e.a1
								}
								divide_variable = {
									which = math.e.tmp
									which = math.e.fct
								}
								change_variable = {
									which = math.e.sm
									which = math.e.tmp
								}
								set_variable = {
									which = math.e.prec
									value = 3
								}
								subtract_variable = {
									which = math.e.prec
									value = 1
								}
								while = {
									limit = {
										check_variable = {
											which = math.e.prec
											value = 1
										}
									}
									subtract_variable = {
										which = math.e.prec
										value = 1
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = math.e.fctl
										value = 1
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = math.e.fct
										which = math.e.fctl
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = math.e.fctl
										value = 1
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = math.e.fct
										which = math.e.fctl
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = math.e.a1
										which = math.e.sq
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = math.e.a2
										which = math.e.sq
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = math.e.a3
										value = 2
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = math.e.tmp
										which = math.e.a2
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = math.e.tmp
										which = math.e.a3
									}
									change_variable = {
										which = math.e.tmp
										which = math.e.a1

										which = math.e.tmp
										which = math.e.fct

										which = math.e.sm
										which = math.e.tmp

								}
							}

								which = math.e.return
								which = math.e.sm

							set_variable = {
								which = exp_val
								which = math.e.return
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.sm
								value = 0

								which = math.e.tmp
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.a1
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.a2
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.a3
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.fctl
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.fct
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.prec
								value = 0
							}
							set_variable = {
								which = math.e.sq
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = math.e.expnt
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = math.e.return
							value = 0
						}
						while = {
							limit = {
								check_variable = {
									which = int_m_exp
									value = 1
								}
							}
							subtract_variable = {
								which = int_m_exp
								value = 1
							}
							multiply_variable = {
								which = exp_val
								which = inp_m_exp
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = exp_m_exp
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = int_m_exp
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = dec_m_exp
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = ln_val
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = inp_m_exp
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = multiplier
						which = exp_val
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = exp_val
						value = 0
					}
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_weight
					which = multiplier
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = multiplier
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
		regiongroup = {
			if = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = production_spread
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_spread
					value = 0
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_spread_save
				which = urban_production_skill_spread
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_weight_save
				which = urban_production_skill_weight
			}
			region = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = {
						which = urban_production_power
						value = 0.1
					}
					NOT = {
						province_id = PREV
					}
				}
				PREV = {
					if = {
						limit = {
							PREV = {
								has_province_flag = production_spread
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_spread
							which = PREV
						}
					}
					else = {
						change_variable = {
							which = urban_production_skill_weight
							which = PREV
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
				which = urban_production_skill_spread
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
				which = urban_production_skill_weight
			}
			region = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = {
						which = urban_production_power
						value = 0.1
					}
					check_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_weight
						value = 0.001
					}
					NOT = {
						has_province_flag = production_spread
					}
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							province_id = PREV
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
						which = PREV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
						which = PREV
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
					which = urban_production_skill_weight
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
					value = 100
				}
				divide_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
					which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
					which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
					value = 0.01
				}
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_spread
				which = urban_production_skill_spread_save
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_weight
				which = urban_production_skill_weight_save
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_spread_save
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = urban_production_skill_weight_save
				value = 0
			}
		}

										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_flag = production_spread
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 100
									}
									divide_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 0.01
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								sr_3 = {
									limit = {
										is_city = yes
										check_variable = {
											which = urban_production_power
											value = 0.1
										}
										check_variable = {
											which = urban_production_skill_weight
											value = 0.001
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_flag = production_spread
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 100
									}
									divide_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 0.01
									}
								}
							}
						}
						else = {
							if = {
								limit = {
									check_variable = {
										which = sr_id
										value = 2
									}
								}
								sr_2 = {
									limit = {
										is_city = yes
										check_variable = {
											which = urban_production_power
											value = 0.1
										}
										check_variable = {
											which = urban_production_skill_weight
											value = 0.001
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_flag = production_spread
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 100
									}
									divide_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 0.01
									}
								}
							}
							else = {
								sr_1 = {
									limit = {
										is_city = yes
										check_variable = {
											which = urban_production_power
											value = 0.1
										}
										check_variable = {
											which = urban_production_skill_weight
											value = 0.001
										}
										NOT = {
											has_province_flag = production_spread
										}
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
										which = PREV
									}
									set_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 100
									}
									divide_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
									}
									multiply_variable = {
										which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
										value = 0.01
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		regiongroup = {
			region = {
				limit = {
					is_city = yes
					check_variable = {
						which = urban_production_power
						value = 0.1
					}
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_added
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_added
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_rec
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_rec
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_region
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_rec
					which = urban_production_skill_gain_sr
				}
				change_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill
					which = urban_production_skill_added
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_1
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 25
							}
						}
						province_event = {
							id = POP_Urban_Goods_Chosen.001
							days = 30
						}
					}
				}
				else_if = {
					limit = {
						has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_2

							check_variable = {
								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 75
							}

							limit = {

								id = POP_Urban_Goods_Chosen.003

								has_province_flag = urban_goods_cloth
							}

								id = POP_Urban_Goods_Chosen.004
								days = 2

					limit = {
						has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_3

								which = urban_production_skill
								value = 75
							}

						id = POP_Urban_Goods_Chosen.005
					}
				}
				trigger_switch = {
					on_trigger = has_province_flag
					urban_goods_rank_1 = {
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = urban_goods_rank_3

								name = mundane_1
								duration = -1
							}
						}
					}
					urban_goods_rank_2 = {

							on_trigger = has_province_flag

					which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum
					value = 0

					which = urban_production_skill_weight_sum
					value = 0

					which = urban_production_skill_spread_sum_save
					value = 0

					value = 0

					value = 0

					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_spread
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_production_skill_weight
					value = 0
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		name = no_localisation
	}

country_event = {
	id = POP_Census.005
	title = "POP_Census.005.t"
	desc = "POP_Census.005.d"
	picture = CITY_DEVELOPMENT_AU_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	immediate = {
		regiongroup = {
			region = {
				limit = {
					NOT = {
						is_wasteland = yes
					}
					NOT = {
						is_city = yes
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = urban_gravity_total
					which = rural_pop_r
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = urban_gravity_total
					value = 0.01
				}
				if = {
					limit = {
						check_variable = {
							which = urban_gravity_total
							value = 0.01
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						which = total_pop_r
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						which = urban_ratio
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t2_P_RTV
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						value = 0.01
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						value = -100
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						which = t2_P_RTV
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = t3_P_RTV
								value = 0.05
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = t1_P_RTV
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_density
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t2_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					divide_variable = {
						which = urban_density
						which = urban_gravity_total
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							NOT = {
								check_variable = {
									which = urban_density
									value = 0.5
								}
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_density
							value = 0.5
						}
					}
				}
				else = {
					set_variable = {
						which = urban_density
						value = 0
					}
				}
			}
		}
		every_country = {
			limit = {
				exists = yes
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = bureaucracy_strength_country
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = capital_num
				value = 0
			}
			set_variable = {
				which = capital_maintenance
				value = 0
			}
		}

				limit = {
					is_city = yes

					limit = {
						has_province_flag = university_present

							NOT = {
								has_province_flag = no_recalc_infra
							}

							which = urban_gravity_base
							value = 0
						}

							which = urban_gravity_percentage
							value = 1
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = urban_gravity_base
							which = rural_pop

							value = 0.01

		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				has_global_flag = wealth_initializing
			}
			every_country = {
				limit = {
					exists = yes
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						NOT = {
							is_wasteland = yes
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_pop
						value = 0.001
					}
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = upper_pop_r
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = upper_total
					value = 0
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = upper_total
					which = country_total_pop_r
				}
				multiply_variable = {
					which = upper_total
					value = 0.05
				}
				set_variable = {
					which = upper_total_weight
					value = 0
				}
				every_owned_province = {
					limit = {
						is_city = yes
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_rural_weight
						value = 0.001
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_pop_contrib
						value = 0
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = wealth_rural_as_asset
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = upper_rural_weight
							which = wealth_rural_as_asset
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = upper_rural_weight
							value = 0.01
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t_P_ITV
						value = 100
					}
					subtract_variable = {
						which = t_P_ITV
						which = urban_ratio
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						which = total_pop_r
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						which = t_P_ITV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t2_P_RTV
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						value = 0.01
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						value = -100
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						which = t2_P_RTV
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = t3_P_RTV
								value = 0.05
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = t1_P_RTV
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_pop_contrib
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t2_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t_P_ITV
						value = 0
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = upper_pop_contrib
						value = 0.1
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = upper_rural_weight
						which = upper_pop_contrib
					}
					change_variable = {
						which = upper_ratio
						which = upper_rural_weight
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_urban_weight
						value = 0.001
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_pop_contrib
						value = 0
					}
					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = wealth_urban_as_asset
								value = 0.001
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = upper_urban_weight
							which = wealth_urban_as_asset
						}
						multiply_variable = {

							value = 0.01
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						which = total_pop_r
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						which = urban_ratio
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t2_P_RTV
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						value = 0.01
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						which = t1_P_RTV

					multiply_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						value = -100

					change_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						which = t2_P_RTV

					if = {
						limit = {
							check_variable = {
								which = t3_P_RTV
								value = 0.05
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = t1_P_RTV
							value = 0.001
						}
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = upper_pop_contrib
						which = t1_P_RTV
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t1_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = {
						which = t2_P_RTV
						value = 0

					set_variable = {
						which = t3_P_RTV
						value = 0
					}
					multiply_variable = {
						which = upper_pop_contrib

								}

										}

										value = 0.2

										which = statTradePowerUrban
										value = 12.8
									}

									multiply_variable = {

								value = 0
							}

								which = statProdMineTemp

								limit = {

								}

								}

									which = statTaxMine

								}

									value = 2.5
								}

									which = statProdMine
									value = 0.2
								}

								set_variable = {
									which = statTaxMine
									value = 0
								}
							}

								which = statIncomeMine
								which = statProdMine
							}

								value = 2.25
							}
						}
						else = {
							multiply_variable = {
								which = Dev_TradePower
								value = 0.30
							}
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromTrade
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromTrade
							which = Dev_TradePower
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromTrade
							which = TradeRuralContrib
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = devUrbanFromTrade
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devUrbanFromTrade
							which = Dev_TradePower
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = devUrbanFromTrade
							which = TradeUrbanContrib
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = devUpperFromTrade
							value = 0
						}

							which = devUpperFromTrade
							which = Dev_TradePower
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = devUpperFromTrade
							which = TradeUpperContrib
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = devFromMine
							which = statProdMine
						}

							which = devFromMine
							value = 2.5
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devFromMine
							which = statTaxMine
						}

							on_trigger = has_province_modifier
							fur_low = {
								change_variable = {

									value = 1.5
								}

								}
							}
							fur_large = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 5.25
								}
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_province_modifier
							pearls_low = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 2.5
								}
							}
							pearls_medium = {
								change_variable = {

							pearls_large = {
								change_variable = {

									value = 9.5
								}
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_province_modifier
							herring_province_small = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 0.375
								}
							}
							herring_province_medium = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 0.75
								}
							}
							herring_province_big = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 1.5
								}
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_province_modifier
							cod_province_small = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 0.375
								}
							}
							cod_province_medium = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 0.75
								}
							}
							cod_province_big = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 1.5
								}
							}
						}
						trigger_switch = {
							on_trigger = has_province_modifier
							ivory_low = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 1.875
								}
							}
							ivory_medium = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 3.75
								}
							}
							ivory_large = {
								change_variable = {
									which = devFromMine
									value = 6
								}
							}
						}
						if = {
							limit = {
								has_province_flag = silk_road_town
							}
							change_variable = {
								which = devFromMine
								value = 0.75
							}
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromIncome
							which = devFromMine
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromIncome
							which = statTaxPopRural
						}
						set_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromProd
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromProd
							which = statTradeValueRural
						}
						change_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromProd
							which = timber_province_production
						}
						multiply_variable = {
							which = devRuralFromProd
							value = 2.5
						}

						}

							which = devRuralFromProd
							which = food_sale_region

						change_variable = {

							which = food_sale_cont
